name: Process Trim Galore
title: Fastq trimming
short_description: Trim fastq data calling Trim Galore

input_files.name: fastq1
input_files.help: path to a FASTQ sequence read file

input_files.name: fastq2
input_files.help: path to a FASTQ sequence read file

arguments.name: quality
arguments.description: Trim low quality reads in addition to adpater removal
arguments.help: Trim low quality reads in addition to adpater removal

arguments.name: phred33
arguments.description: Instructs Cutadapt to use ASCII+33 quality scores as Phred scores
arguments.help: Instructs Cutadapt to use ASCII+33 quality scores as Phred scores

arguments.name: phred64
arguments.description: Instructs Cutadapt to use ASCII+64 quality scores as Phred scores
arguments.help: Instructs Cutadapt to use ASCII+64 quality scores as Phred scores

arguments.name: fastqc
arguments.description: Run FastQC in the default mode on the FastQ file once trimming is complete
arguments.help: Run FastQC in the default mode on the FastQ file once trimming is complete

arguments.name: adapter2
arguments.description: Optional adapter sequence to be trimmed off read 2 of paired-end files.
arguments.help: Optional adapter sequence to be trimmed off read 2 of paired-end files.

arguments.name: illumina
arguments.description: Adapter sequence to be trimmed is the first 13bp of the Illumina universal adapter
arguments.help: Adapter sequence to be trimmed is the first 13bp of the Illumina universal adapter

arguments.name: nextera
arguments.description: Adapter sequence to be trimmed is the first 12bp of the Nextera adapter
arguments.help: Adapter sequence to be trimmed is the first 12bp of the Nextera adapter

arguments.name: small_rna
arguments.description: Adapter sequence to be trimmed is the first 12bp of the Illumina Small RNA 3' Adapter
arguments.help: Adapter sequence to be trimmed is the first 12bp of the Illumina Small RNA 3' Adapter

arguments.name: max_length
arguments.description: Discard reads that are longer than bp after trimming
arguments.help: Discard reads that are longer than bp after trimming

arguments.name: stringency
arguments.description: Overlap with adapter sequence required to trim a sequence
arguments.help: Overlap with adapter sequence required to trim a sequence

arguments.name: length
arguments.description: Discard reads that became shorter than length INT because of either quality or adapter trimming
arguments.help: Discard reads that became shorter than length INT because of either quality or adapter trimming
